long_description: ideal mattress canada designs and manufactures organic mattresses made of the highest quality latex, wool, cotton and silk which are primary components we use in all of our mattresses. our clientele ranges from individual customers that want custom tailored quality organic luxury mattress, and we also supply to wholesale organic mattress distributors and specialty mattress shops under a private label branding. our products are the result of global travel in search of the finest and best suited raw materials and well-developed relationships with foreign suppliers â€“ all to ensure that we produce a unique and truly superior mattress for every customer. this is a testing standard recognized for 'children- safe' material. sgs institute has assessed and certified the latex manufacture factory meets all requirements to manufacture latex in accordance of iso14001.
